title: Performance of Machine Learning for Ozone Modeling in Southern California during the COVID-19 Shutdown

We combine machine learning (ML) and geospatial interpolations to create two-dimensional high-resolution ozone concentration fields over the South Coast Air Basin (SoCAB) for the entire year of 2020. The interpolated...
